title: 1.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
Write a Java program to evaluate the number of gallons of water a cylindrical tank can hold, if the diameter of the tank is 4 meters and the height of the tank is 10 meters. Print the values of diameter and height considered, and volume in gallons after the calculations. (Consider Ï€ = 3. 14, and 1 cubic meter = 264 gallons).
